alert.note: Alert for Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ulster and southwestern Greene Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fleischmanns, or 14 miles west of Hunter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Hunter, Lanesville, Phoenicia, Shandaken, Lexington, Tannersville, Edgewood, Mapledale, Jewett Center, Platte Clove, Big Indian, Oliverea, Chichester, Beecher Corners, Spruceton, West Kill, Allaben, Elka Park, South Jewett and Seager. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central New York.
